name: GroupRecordPage

fields.name: current​PageUrl
fields.description: Chatter REST API URL identifying the current page.

fields.name: next​PageUrl
fields.description: Chatter REST API URL identifying the next page, or null if there isn’t a next page.

fields.name: previous​PageUrl
fields.description: Chatter REST API URL identifying the previous page, or null if there isn’t a previous

fields.name: records
fields.description: List of records on the current page.

fields.name: total​Record​Count
fields.description: Total number of records associated with the group.

description: A paginated list of ConnectApi.GroupRecord objects.
